Detailed Description

This TestRunner can help you dump .leak and .status file in /data/memeleak after gtest run over.

.leak file: you can use tcs translate it to check memleak.

.status file: you can get Process's VmRSS info before/after gtest.

The usage is same with gaia::testing::InstrumentationTestRunner . Define instrumentation info in gaia.xml with name gaia::testing::InstrumentationCoreTestRunner then use command:"adb shell instrument <package name> gaia::testing::InstrumentationTestCoreRunner" to run the test.
